casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Joseph A. Torrice (8308)

Spallone, O’Connell and Norcott, Js.

Argued May 4 decision released May 9, 1990 M. Leonard Caine III, special public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Judith Rossi, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were John Connelly, state’s attorney, and Corinne Klatt, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
